app.title: Content Strategy Studio
app.subtitle: Culturally relevant content, built step-by-step by your virtual team.

Strategist.label: Strategist
Strategist.description: Clarifies the goal, audience, and emotional angle for your topic (US Hispanic community first).

Copywriter.label: Copywriter
Copywriter.description: Drafts scroll-stopping captions and microreel scripts with clear CTAs and cultural nuance.

Designer.label: Designer
Designer.description: Suggests visuals and silent-video beats that fit the emotion, niche, and platform constraints.

Editor.label: Editor
Editor.description: Polishes clarity, tone, and compliance—keeping it human, respectful, and conversion-focused.

CRM.label: CRM
CRM.description: Aligns content to follow-up flows and lead capture (DM prompts, WhatsApp-ready messaging).

Coordinator.label: Coordinator
Coordinator.description: Packages variations, checks readiness for export, and helps you deploy consistently.

topic.title: Topic
topic.label: Enter a topic
topic.placeholder: e.g., Telemedicine access for busy families
topic.help: Minimum 3 characters. Tip: include a pain point, audience, or desired emotion.
topic.validationGeneric: Try adding a specific audience, problem, or benefit.

preview.title: Preview
preview.placeholderBody: Generated variations will appear here (stub). You will be able to preview and export to WhatsApp/Facebook.
preview.exportStub: Export/share actions will be added here (WhatsApp, Facebook) once keys and endpoints are configured.

inline.topic: Tip: Start with a clear pain point + audience (e.g., "busy families"), then refine using suggestions.
inline.workflow: The workflow shows what each virtual role contributes. You can read each role description and track what’s current vs completed.
inline.preview: Preview and export tools will live here. Use this panel to review title/body and confirm channel formatting.
inline.language: Use the language toggle in the header to switch English/Spanish anytime.
inline.feedback: Look for confirmation and error messages below the header; they’re announced to screen readers.

workflow.title: Workflow sidebar (roles)
workflow.body:
Your virtual bot team works in roles (Strategist → Copywriter → Designer → Editor → CRM → Coordinator).
Use the left sidebar to understand each role and see what's current vs completed.

topic.title: Topic input and suggestions
topic.body:
Enter a topic and confirm it to start the workflow.
Use “Get suggestions” to explore variations (safe stub until integrations are configured).

preview.title: Preview & Export panel
preview.body:
The right panel shows preview content and (later) export tools.
Use it to review your title/body and channel formatting.

language.title: Language toggle
language.body: Switch between English and Spanish anytime using the header language button.

feedback.title: Feedback & notifications
feedback.body:
Important updates appear below the header (success, info, and error messages).
They are announced to screen readers to keep you informed.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.body:
Use the Topic panel to enter a topic.
Advance the workflow to simulate your virtual team’s progress.
Use Preview to review outputs and prepare for export.

topicInput.title: Topic Input
topicInput.body:
Minimum 3 characters.
Try adding an audience, problem, and benefit.
Use suggestions to explore culturally relevant framing.

workflow.title: Workflow & roles
workflow.body:
Each role contributes a different perspective.
Current steps are highlighted; completed steps are marked as completed.
Click a role to read its description.

previewExport.title: Preview & Export
previewExport.body:
Preview shows what you’re building.
Export tools will be added later (WhatsApp/Facebook) once integrations are configured.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.body:
Keyboard: Tab/Shift+Tab to move, Enter/Space to activate.
Modals: Escape to close.
Messages: important changes are announced via screen readers.

messages.topicConfirmed: Topic confirmed. Your workflow is ready.
messages.integrationUnavailable: Integration not configured yet. This is a safe no-op stub.
messages.onboardingComplete: Onboarding complete. You can reopen it anytime from the header.
